text: Pikmin 4 is a real-time strategy video game developed by Nintendo EPD and published by Nintendo. It is the fourth main entry in the Pikmin series and the sixth entry overall. It was released on the Nintendo Switch on July 21, 2023. Pikmin 4 got good reviews from critics, who praised the game's level design, visuals, score, amount of content, and access to newcomers, while criticizing the limited multiplayer options and low difficulty. == References == ===Notes=== Category:2023 video games Category:Multiplayer and single- player video games Category:Nintendo video games Category:Nintendo Switch games Category:Nintendo Switch-only games Category:Pikmin Category:Real-time strategy video games Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games about dogs Category:Video games about extraterrestrial life Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Pikmin 4
